Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: West Memphis is represents the largest city in Crittenden County and is located within the Memphis MSA, a DMA of more that 1.3 million people, offering residents of West Memphis easy access to world-class health facilities, cultural opportunities, and other amenities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is the exclusive marketing advisor for 100 Bridgeport Avenue, West Memphis, consisting of approximately 49.7 acres. The site represents the former BASF manufacturing facility, which is in the process of being decommissioned and demolished. Utilities are in place and the site is certifiedunder the ISO 9001:2000 management system.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Chaffee Crossing is a ±105 acre plot along the future I-49 extension in Fort Smith, Arkansas, 25 minutes southeast of downtown Fort Smith, currently listed at $2.4 million. Largely undeveloped and unzoned, this expansive property is blank canvas that can easily be split into smaller parcels or rezoned to best meet a future tenant or owner’s needs. The property is approximately 75% cleared is prepped to receive utility connections. Neighboring Mars Petcare, Graphic Packaging International, and Glatfelter, Chaffee Crossing could be developed into an extended industrial park.
